title: GHLCRISTAL
author: GHLCRISTAL
content: Hi I want to buy Betfair historical data for soccer but i don't want to buy it direct from Betfair as it's too expensive.I want to use it to backtest a model. Maybe someone has already bought / recorded it and would be interested in selling it on?I need it for the top 25 or so soccer leagues over at least a full season from last couple of years. This should be around 10k games. I need the Pro data package.@and10and10
